mapper.insert: insert into notice(noticeNum, num, subject, content, notice) values (#{noticeNum}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice, jdbcType=INTEGER})
insert into noticeFile(noticeFileNum, noticeNum, saveFileName, originalFileName, fileSize) values (noticeFile_seq.nextval, #{noticeNum}, #{saveFileName}, #{originalFileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from notice n join memberDetail m on m.num=n.num

select n.noticeNum, n.notice, n.subject, md.nickName, hitCount, to_char(created, 'yyyy-mm-dd') created, nvl(fileCount, 0) fileCount from notice n join memberDetail md on md.num=n.num left outer join ( select noticeNum, count(*) fileCount from noticeFile group by noticeNum ) nf on n.noticeNum = nf.noticeNum where n.notice = 1 order by n.noticeNum desc

select n.noticeNum, n.notice, n.subject, md.nickName, hitCount, created, nvl(fileCount, 0) fileCount from notice n join memberDetail md on md.num=n.num left outer join ( select noticeNum, count(*) fileCount from noticeFile group by noticeNum ) f on n.noticeNum = f.noticeNum
order by n.noticeNum desc offset #{offset} rows fetch first #{rows} rows only
select n.num, md.userId, nickName, subject, created, content, noticeNum, hitCount, notice from notice n join memberDetail md on md.num=n.num where n.noticeNum = #{noticeNum}

select noticeNum, subject from notice n join memberDetail md on n.num=md.num
and (noticeNum > #{noticeNum})
order by noticeNum asc fetch first 1 rows only

select noticeNum, subject from notice n join memberDetail md on n.num=md.num
and (noticeNum < #{noticeNum})
order by noticeNum desc fetch first 1 rows only
update notice set hitCount= hitCount+1 where noticeNum = #{noticeNum}
mapper.update: update notice set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, notice=#{notice} where noticeNum = #{noticeNum}
